name: Lazer_X version 4.0.0
description: Lazer_X is a new WhatsApp bot with amazing features. Make your WhatsApp more useful to you

SUDO.description: If you need to control your Lazer_X from another number paste it in the international form ex:- 947xxxxxxxx [94 is the Sri Lankan code] If you don't need this option, leave this.

BIO.description: Change the about of your Lazer_X.
BIO.value: Get your service from me. cause I'm the Lazer_X

AUTO_STICKER.description: If you like this option [AUTO_STICKER] you can write 'true'. If you don't want it, leave this.
